text: Aur yateemon ko unn kay baligh ho janey tak sidhartay aur aazmatay raho phir agar inn mein tum hoshiyari aur husn-e-tadbeer pao to enhen inn kay maal sonp do aur inn kay baray ho janey kay darr say inn kay maalon ko jaldi jaldi fazool kharchiyon mein tabah na kerdo maal daron ko chahaiye kay (inn kay maal say) bachtay rahen haan miskeen mohtaj ho to dastoor kay mutabiq wajibi tor say kha ley phir jab enhen inn kay maal sonpo to gawah bana lo dar asal hisab lenay wala Allah Taalaa hi kafi hai
